headline: HCA Healthcare Foundation Awards $1 Million Grant to Educate Texas for Healthcare Career Pathways
summary: HCA Healthcare Inc. (NYSE:HCA) is one of the undervalued S&P 500 stocks to buy according to hedge funds. On June 26, HCA Healthcare announced that its HCA Healthcare Foundation, through its Healthier Tomorrow Fund, will provide a new $1 million grant to Educate Texas, which is an initiative of Communities Foundation of Texas. HCA Healthcare […]
